6.63: Double Edge No longer has a 75/90/105/120 manacost. Damage to self is no longer lethal (can't be used to deny self anymore).
6.61: Reduced  Double Edge cooldown from 25 to 12.
6.67: Reworked  Return damage from 12.5/25/37.5/50 to 10 + 26%/34%/42%/50% of Centaur's  strength as damage.
6.42: Return No longer deals damage to melee attackers in 2 instances (it used to deal 5/10/15/20 upon attack start and 10/20/30/40 upon reaching attack point). Reduced damage to melee attackers from 15/30/45/60 to 12.5/15/37.5/50. Increased damage to ranged attackers from 5/10/15/20 to 12.5/15/37.5/50.
6.00: Hoof Stomp Increased cooldown from 8.5 to 10.5. Reduced radius from 350 to 275.
5.55: Reduced base  strength from 24 to 23. Increased base  agility and gain from 12 + 1.25 to 14 + 2. Increased base  intelligence and gain from 15 1.5 to 16 + 2. Increased base armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 2.96).  Hoof Stomp Reduced stun duration from 1/1.75/2.5/3.25 to 0.75/1.5/2.25/3. Increased manacost from 80/95/105/120 to 80/100/115/130. Increased cooldown from 7 to 8.5. Increased Insult radius from 200/300/400/600 to 200/350/500/700.
5.65: Return Changed damage type against ranged units from HP Removal to Physical. Now deals the damage dealt to ranged units to melee units as well. This means it deals 5/10/15/20 damage to melee units upon attack start, and then 10/20/30/40 again upon reaching attack point.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.35: Increased armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 3.1).
6.34: Increased  Hoof Stomp radius from 275 to 315.
6.72d: Increased  Return base damage from 10 to 16. Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.76c: Stampede Increased cooldown from 65 to 120/90/60. Rescaled duration from 3/4/5 to 3.75. Reworked damage from 100/150/200 + 2x  strength to 0 + 1/2/3x   strength. Increased manacost from 50 to 80. Reduced collision radius from 120 to 105. Removed Centaur Warrunner from Captain's Mode.
6.79: Increased  Stampede slow duration from 1.25 seconds to 1.5.
6.84b: Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Stampede incoming damage reduction from 70% to 60%.
6.75: Double Edge now deals its damage in a 190 radius around the target.
6.74: Increased  Return base damage from 16 to 16/18/20/22. Increased  Great Fortitude  strength bonus from 12/24/36 to 15/30/45.
6.77: Reduced Movement speed from 305 to 300.  Double Edge no longer interrupts channeling of the target (0.01 second ministun removed).  Stampede now applies a 100% slow instead of a stun.
6.76: Increased  Strength gain from 2.6 to 3.8.  Great Fortitude replaced with  Stampede
6.70: Increased  Hoof Stomp stun duration from 1.25/1.75/2.25/2.75 to 2.0/2.25/2.5/2.75.
6.73: Reduced  Double Edge cooldown from 10 to 8.
6.72: Increased attack range from 100 to 128. Increased Movement speed from 300 to 305. Reduced  Double Edge cooldown from 12 to 10. Reduced  Hoof Stomp cooldown from 15 to 13.
5.58: Increased base  agility from 14 to 15. Reduced base  intelligence and gain from 16 + 2 to 15 + 1.7. Reduced base attack damage from 32-42 to 32-34 (total attack damage is now 55-57). Reduced base armor from 1 to 0 (total armor is now 2.1). Replaced Insult with  Double Edge
6.81: Increased  Hoof Stomp manacost from 85/100/115/130 to 130.
6.84: Return Return damage is no longer reduced by Damage Block. Now triggers when attacks land rather than when they start. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Centaur Warrunner: Causes  Stampede to reduce 70% of all incoming damage for allied units and grants them unobstructed movement. Destroys Trees.
6.20: Hoof Stomp Rescaled stun duration from 0.75/1.5/2.25/3 to 1.25/1.75/2.25/2.75. Increased damage from 50/100/150/200 to 100/150/200/250.
6.21: Increased  Hoof Stomp cooldown from 10.5 to 15.
6.27b: Increased  Hoof Stomp manacost from 80/100/115/130 to 85/100/115/130.
6.48b: Double Edge now deals magical damage to Centaur, instead of pure.
